DataElement.preferredName: Person Adherence Study Consent Withdrawal Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response to a question asking to specify other reason for not participating in the adherence study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The act of abiding by a stated treatment plan or protocol._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._Permission to do something._A social or emotional detachment, pathological retreat from objective reality, interpersonal contact and social involvement, as in some forms of schizophrenia, depression, or schizoid, avoidant, or schizotypal personality disorders.

A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

A social or emotional detachment, pathological retreat from objective reality, interpersonal contact and social involvement, as in some forms of schizophrenia, depression, or schizoid, avoidant, or schizotypal personality disorders.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
